title: Mum who 'shot dead teen who raped her daughter, 6,' to be tried for murder
text:

A mum faces a murder trial for killing a man she says raped her six-year-old daughter.

Connie Serbu, 43, allegedly lured Xavier Sierra, 18, into an isolated, undeveloped area of land after picking him up from a job interview.

She allegedly tricked him into coming with her by saying she needed help assembling a bunk bed, court records show.

The incident that followed led to the death of Sierra.

Naples News reports that officers responded to reports of gunshots on July 7, 2016, and found Sierra dead near a river in Naples, Florida.

(Image: mirror.co.uk)

It was more than a year later, on August 25, 2017, that Serbu's second-degree murder charges were revealed by police.

Serbu alleges that, on May 30, 2016, her daughter told her she had been molested by family friend Sierra five years previous.

Enraged, she indicated to others her intention to kill Sierra.

(Image: mirror.co.uk)

The court records show she told her husband he should prepare to look after their two children alone as "she was going to do something".

Naples News reports it was June 1, 2016 when Serbu mentioned assembling the bunk bed to Sierra. On June 8, her brother John Vargas, 29, arrived in town.

Court records state that Vargas was 'developmentally disabled' and easily persuaded.

(Image: mirror.co.uk)

He and Serbu bought a phone and a Verizon rechargeable card for it, which they used only for communicating with Sierra. Using the phone, Serbu arranged to pick Sierra up and pay him for assembling the bunk bed on July 7, 2016.

Taking Vargas with her, she instead drove Sierra to the location, while confronting him about her daughter's accusation.

Naples News reports the pair chased Sierra into some woods and it is believed the two men died while wrestling for 'one of Serbu's guns'.

(Image: mirror.co.uk)

Sierra was said to have received gunshot wounds from 'both guns', while Vargas was hit in the abdomen, killing him.

The Sun reports Sierra was chased down when he tried to escape and Sierra himself fired a gun six times after wrestling Vargas for it.

Serbu was reportedly still at the scene when police arrived.

Officers allege she made a confession which showed no remorse, saying: “It’s all my fault. So I don’t care, he raped my daughter … she told me everything that happened.”
description: Connie Serbu allegedly murdered Xavier Sierra after accusing him of raping her child
